meanings.sent1: She decided to use markers instead of crayons for her drawing.
meanings.sent2: I will walk instead of taking the bus.
meanings.sent3: He brought a spoon to a fork fight, using it instead of a weapon.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room, instead of the usual silence.
meanings.sent5: The bright red apple stood out instead of blending in with the others.

meanings.definition: In place of someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: He sat at the front of the class instead of the back.
meanings.sent2: She chose to stay home instead of going to the party.
meanings.sent3: The cat napped on the warm blanket instead of the cold floor.
meanings.sent4: The stars shone brightly instead of the city lights.
meanings.sent5: The new student sat at the empty desk instead of the crowded table.
